text: Igor Omelin (born 30 August 1995) is a Russian freestyle skier. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. and recently came second in Ski Cross World Cup. He participated in the men's ski cross. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Freestyle skiers at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Russian male freestyle skiers Category:Olympic freestyle skiers of Russia Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Russia Category:Universiade medalists in freestyle skiing Category:Competitors at the 2013 Winter Universiade
title: Igor Omelin
